api.database.create module¶

class api.database.create.Create(db_url: str)¶

Bases: CRUDBase

create_user(email: str, password: str, active: bool, admin: bool) → None¶

Sign-In Database function.

Parameters:

  • email (str) – User Email

  • password (str) – Hashed Password

  • active (bool) – User status

  • admin (bool) – User Role

Raises:

psycopg2.OperationalError – If user already exists or a connection error happens.

check_db_connection() → bool¶

Check Database Connection.

Returns:

Confirmation of Database Server is running healthy.

Return type:

bool

create_security_table() → None¶

Create ‘security’ table if not exists.

This method creates the ‘security’ table with the specified fields: - id: Numeric, auto-increment, primary key - email: Varchar(50), unique - password: Varchar(50) - active: Boolean - admin: Boolean

get_connection()¶

Give connection to CRUD functions.

Returns:

Postgres Database connection

Return type:

psycopg2.connection
